name: ASCDC LOD Datasets Platform
description: This platform collects Linked Open Datasets converted by ASCDC, with over 600,000 5-star open data entries and over 5.3 million triplets, composing 13 LOD datasets in various fields, downloadable and searchable via SPARQL query. The datasets cover topics such as digital cultural heritage, rare books, natural history, and more.
owner_name: Academia Sinica Center for Digital Cultures (ASCDC)
